content: ______________________________________________________â›¤WEBSITEâ›¤ TWITTERâ›¤TELEGRAMâ›¤ DISCORDâ›¤ MEDIUMâ›¤ GITHUBâ›¤ WHITPAPERâ›¤______________________________________________________Â ğŸ”¸5000 $USDT worth of Token  tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.ğŸ”¸The bounty program was launched on 09 September 2023 and will run until Â 15 September 2023.ğŸ”¸Tokens will be distributed to participants the end of the Bounty Campaign ğŸ”¸All participants must join Trust M.C 100 Telegram Group, Telegram ChannelAnd Join FXDX  Telegram Group Twitter PageğŸ”¸ Please ask your bounty-related questions in the  Trust M.C 100 .ğŸ”¸KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.ğŸ”¸Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. ğŸ”¸Participants with a minimum of 30+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaignsğŸ”¸Negative Trusted Accounts not allow.ğŸ”¸All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Twitter Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 40%Telegram Â  Â  Â 25%Â Article Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 15%TikTok or YouTube Â  Â  Â 20% Â  Â Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread Week: 1 (09/09-15/09)Rewards:  1. 1000 - 3000 followers: 5 stake/week2. 3001 - 5000 followers: 7 stakes/week3. 5001 - 8000 followers: 10 stakes/week4. 8001+ - followers: 14 stakes/weekRules: Â â–ªï¸Must follow FXDX  Twitter Page.â–ªï¸Must Join FXDX  Telegram group .â–ªï¸ Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 1000 followers.â–ªï¸Participants have to make 5 retweet & 2 new posts per week with project link otherwise you get rewarded zero[Maximum 1 post/Day]â–ªï¸Time gap between 2 posts needs to be 12 hours minimum.â–ªï¸Participants must use $FXDX #FXDX #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags & website link in every tweet & retweet.  Twitter Joining formRewards:2 stakes/par post Rules:â–ªï¸Must Join FXDX Telegram group .â–ªï¸Update your Telegram name Â Your Name | FXDX Ambassador.(Example: Trust M.C 100 | FXDX Ambassador)â–ªï¸Replace your profile picture with  FXDX.â–ªï¸Participants can only wear one project name at a time. â–ªï¸Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. â–ªï¸Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchangeâ€™s telegram groupsâ–ªï¸You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.Â   Telegram Joining formRewards:  1. Have more than 1000 views: 1 stake2. Have more than 2000 views: 2 stake3. Have more than 3000 views: 3 stake4. Have more than 5000 views: 5stakes5. Have more than 10,000 views: 10 stakesRules: â–ªï¸Must Join FXDX  Telegram group .â–ªï¸TikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts must have a minimum of 200 followers or subscribe.â–ªï¸Videos need to be unique and have at least 1000 views. â–ªï¸Videos need to be a minimum of 2 minutes in length. â–ªï¸Participant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features, latest project's token updates/development, etc.â–ªï¸Participants have to shoot 2 unique videos Â (maximum 1 video/week).â–ªï¸Participants must use $FXDX #FXDX #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags , wallet address & website link in every video.  TikTok or YouTube Joining formReward: ğŸ”¸Good: 1ğŸ”¸Best: 2ğŸ”¸Better: 3Rules: Â â–ªï¸Must Join FXDX Telegram group.Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words. (Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards)â–ªï¸Each participant can write more than 1 article, however, the articles need to be clearly different from each other and published at another website,â–ªï¸Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible. Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.â–ªï¸Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.â–ªï¸Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the the Proof of Authentication, the project's ICO website, main website, Medium page,â–ªï¸Participants must use $FXDX #FXDX #Metaverse #NFT#Binance #ETH #Ethereum hashtags , wallet address & website link in Article.  Article Joining formAll participants have to submit their weekly reports [ Twitter, Telegram Â ] on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: [b] Twitter Campaign[/b]Spreadsheet No:Tweet Link1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Retweet Link1. 2.
